inputs.remark:
Ordered list & V1: Add Middle/Late Latency Responses.
Timeline: Expected outcome should belong to V2.

logic_summary: Added 'Middle and Late Latency Responses' to ordered_list and V1 tests based on OCR findings.
Converted 'expected_outcome' strings into a structured 'V2' visit within 'expected_interpretations_by_visit' to reflect the 5-year follow-up.
Removed the original 'expected_outcome' field as its content has been moved to V2.

value.rationale_short: To assess central auditory pathway function.

value.collective_interpretation: Significant decline in hearing sensitivity and speech recognition bilaterally over 5 years.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Left ear progressed to moderate mid-frequency SNHL; Right ear progressed to moderate-to-severe high-frequency SNHL.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: Left WRS decreased to 70% at 80 dB HL; Right WRS dropped to 0% at all intensities.

tests.name: Acoustic reflexes
tests.result_summary: Absent with right ear stimulation. Left ipsilateral reflex absent (suggesting left facial nerve involvement); left contralateral reflex preserved.
